T03bsu028pu:3: 1 atha khalu bhagavāṃstāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃpraharṣaṇārthaṃ
T03bsu028pu:4: punarapīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paridīpayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T03bsu028pu:5: para prema gaurava prasāda upasthapitvā prajahitva āvaraṇa kleśamalātikrāntāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:6: śṛṇutā jagārthamabhiprasthita sura(vra?)tānāṃ prajñāya pāramita yatra
T03bsu028pu:8: yāvanti nadya pravahantiha jambudvīpe phala puṣpa auṣadhā(dhi) vanaspati rohayanti /
T03bsu028pu:9: bhūja(ta) gajendranāgapatiniśrayanovata(na)sya(?) tasyānubhāvaśriya sābhu jagādhipasya yāvanti dharma jinaśrāvaka deśayanti bhāṣanti yuktisahitāṃśca udīrayanti /
T03bsu028pu:10: paramārthasaukhyakriya tatphalaprāptitā ca sarvo ayaṃ puruṣakāru tathāgatasya // Rgs_1.3 //
T03bsu028pu:11: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ya jina bhāṣati dharmanetrīṃ tatrābhiśikṣita nararṣabhaśiṣyabhūtāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:12: sākṣātkaritva yatha śikṣita deśayanti buddhānubhāva puna ātmabalānubhāvā
T03bsu028pu:13: yasminna prajñavarapāramitopalabdhiḥ na ca bodhisattvaupalabdhi na cittabodheḥ /
T03bsu028pu:14: evaṃ śruṇitva na ca muhyati nāsti trāso so bodhi(sa)ttva carate sugatāna prajñām // Rgs_1.5
T03bsu028pu:15: na ca rupa vedana na saṃjña na cetanā ca vijñāna sthānu aṇumātra na bhonti tasya /
T03bsu028pu:16: so sarvadharmaasthito aniketacārī aparī(ri)gṛhīta labhate sugatāna bodhim
T03bsu028pu:17: atha śreṇikasya abhutī parivrājakasya jñānopalambhu na hi skandhavibhāvanā ca /
T03bsu028pu:18: yo bodhisattva parijānati eva dharmāṃ na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati so viharāti prajñām // Rgs_1.7
T03bsu028pu:19: vyuparīkṣate punarayaṃ katareṣu prajñā kasmātkuto va imi śūnyaka sarva dharmāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:20: vyuparīkṣamāṇu na ca līyati nāsti trāso āsannu so bhavati bodhayi bodhisattvo // Rgs_1.8 //
T03bsu028pu:21: saci rupa saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna skandha caratī aprajānamāno /
T03bsu028pu:22: imi skandha śūnya parikalpayi bodhisattvo caratī nimittaanupādapade asakto // Rgs_1.9 //
T03bsu028pu:23: na ca rupa vedana na saṃjña na cetanāyā vijñāni yo na caratī aniketacārī /
T03bsu028pu:24: caratīti so na upagacchati prajñadhārī anupādadhī spṛśati śānti samādhi śreṣṭhām // Rgs_1.10
T03bsu028pu:25: evātmaśānti viharanniha bodhisattvo so vyākṛto puramakehi tathāgatehi /
T03bsu028pu:26: na ca manyate ahu samādhitu vyutthito vā kasmārtha dharmaprakṛtiṃ parijānayitvā // Rgs_1.11
T03bsu028pu:27: evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñāṃ no cāpi so labhati yatra carāti dharmam /
T03bsu028pu:28: caraṇaṃ ca so 'caraṇaṃ ca prajānayitvā eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā
T03bsu028pu:29: yo 'sau na vidyati sa eṣa avidyamāno tāṃ bālu kalpayi avidya karoti vidyām /
T03bsu028pu:30: vidyā avidya ubhi eti asanta dharmā niryāti yo iti prajānati bodhisattvo // Rgs_1.13 //
T03bsu028pu:31: māyopamāṃ ya iha jānati pañca skandhāṃ na ca māya anya na ca skandha karoti anyān /
T03bsu028pu:32: nānātvasaṃjñavigato upaśāntacārī eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā //
T03bsu028pu:33: kalyāṇamitrasahitasya vipaśyakasya trāso na bheṣyati śruṇitva jināna mātrām /
T03bsu028pu:34: yo pāpamitrasahito ca parapraṇeyo so āmabhājana yathodakaspṛṣṭa bhinno //
T03bsu028pu:35: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ayu pravucyati bodhisattvo sarvatra saṅgakriya icchati saṅgachedī /
T03bsu028pu:36: bodhiṃ spṛśiṣyati jināna asaṅgabhūtāṃ tasmāddhi nāma labhate ayu bodhisattvo // Rgs_1.16 //
T03bsu028pu:37: mahasattva so 'tha kenocyati kāraṇena mahatāya atra ayu bheṣyati
T03bsu028pu:39: dṛṣṭīgatāṃ mahati chindati sattvadhātoḥ mahasattva tena hi pravucyati kāraṇena // Rgs_1.17
T03bsu028pu:40: mahanāyako mahatabuddhi mahānubhāvo mahayāna uttamajināna samādhirūḍho /
T03bsu028pu:41: mahatā sanaddhu namuciṃ śaṭha dharṣayiṣye mahasattva tena hi pravucyati kāraṇena // Rgs_1.18
T03bsu028pu:42: māyākaro yatha catuṣpathi nirmiṇitvā mahato janasya bahu chindati śīrṣakoṭī /
T03bsu028pu:43: yatha te ca māya tatha jānati sarvasattvāṃ nirmāṇu sarva jagato na ca tasya trāso // Rgs_1.19
T03bsu028pu:44: rupaṃ ca saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna bandhu na ca mukta asaṅgabhūto /
T03bsu028pu:45: evaṃ ca bodhi kramate na ca līnacitto saṃnā ha eṣa varapudgalauttamānām //
T03bsu028pu:46: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ayu pravucyati bodhiyāno yatrāruhitva sa nirvāpayi sarvasattvān /
T03bsu028pu:47: ākāśatulya ayu yāna mahāvimāno sukhasaukhyakṣemabhiprāpaṇu yānaśreṣṭho //
T03bsu028pu:48: na ca labhyate ya vrajate diśa āruhitvā nirvāṇaokagamanaṃ gati nopalabdhiḥ
T03bsu028pu:49: yatha agni nirvṛtu na tasya gatipracāro so tena nirvṛti pravucyati kāraṇena // Rgs_1.22 //
T03bsu028pu:50: pūrvāntato na upalabhyati bodhisattvo aparāntato 'pi pratiupanna triyadhvaśuddho /
T03bsu028pu:51: yo śuddha so anabhisaṃskṛtu niṣprapañco eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā
T03bsu028pu:52: yasmiṃś ca kāli samaye vidu bodhisattvo evaṃ carantu anupādu vicintayitvā
T03bsu028pu:53: mahatīṃ janeti karuṇāṃ na ca sattvasaṃjñā eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.24 //
T03bsu028pu:54: saci sattvasaṃjña dukhasaṃjña upādayātī hariṣyāmi duḥkha jagatīṃ kariṣyāmi artham /
T03bsu028pu:55: so ātmasa(ttva) parikalpaku bodhisattvo na ca eṣa prajñavarapāramitāya
T03bsu028pu:57: yatha ātmanaṃ tatha prajānati sarvasattvāṃ yatha sarvasattva tatha prajānati sarvadharmān
T03bsu028pu:58: anupādupādu ubhaye avikalpamāno eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā //
T03bsu028pu:59: yāvanti loki parikīrtita dharmanāma sarveṣupādasamatikramu nirgamitvā /
T03bsu028pu:60: amṛtaṃ ti jñānu paramaṃ na tu yo pareṇa ekārtha prajña ayu pāramiteti nāmā
T03bsu028pu:61: evaṃ carantu na ca kāṅkṣati bodhisattvo jñātavya yo vihara te sa upāyaprajño /
T03bsu028pu:62: prakṛtīasanta parijānayamāna dharmāṃ eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā //
T03bsu028pu:64: rupasmi yo na sthihate na ca vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāya yo na sthihate na ca cetanāyām /
T03bsu028pu:65: vijñāni yo na sthihate sthitu dharmatāyāṃ eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_2.1 //
T03bsu028pu:68: phalaprāptitāya athito arahantabhūmau pratyekabhūmiathito tatha buddhabhūmau // Rgs_2.2 //
T03bsu028pu:69: yatha nāyako 'sthitaku dhātuasaṃskṛtāyā tatha saṃskṛtāya athito aniketacārī /
T03bsu028pu:70: evaṃ ca sthānu athito sthita bodhisattvo asthānu sthānu ayu sthānu jinena ukto // Rgs_2.3
T03bsu028pu:71: yo icchatī sugataśrāvaka haṃ bhaveyaṃ pratyekabuddha bhaviyāṃ tatha dharmarājo /
T03bsu028pu:72: imu kṣāntyanāgami na śakyati prāpuṇetuṃ yatha ārapāragamanāya atītadarśī // Rgs_2.4 //
T03bsu028pu:73: yo dharma bhāṣyati ya bhāṣyati bhāṣyamāṇāṃ phalaprāpta pratyayajino tatha lokanātho /
T03bsu028pu:74: nirvāṇato adhigato vidupaṇḍitehi sarve ta ātmaja nidṛṣṭa tathāgatena //
T03bsu028pu:75: catvāri pudgala ime na trasanti ye 'smin jinaputra satyakuśalo avivartiyaśca /
T03bsu028pu:76: arhaṃ vidhūtamalakleśa prahīṇakāṅkṣo kalyāṇamitraparipācita yaścaturthaḥ // Rgs_2.6 //
T03bsu028pu:77: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo nārhaṃmi śikṣati na pratyayabuddhabhūmau /
T03bsu028pu:78: sarvajñatāya anuśikṣati buddhadharme śikṣāaśikṣa na ya śikṣati eṣa śikṣā
T03bsu028pu:79: na ca rupavṛddhiparihāṇiparigrahāye na ca śikṣati vividhadharmaparigrahāye
T03bsu028pu:80: sarvajñatāṃ ca parigṛhṇati śikṣamāṇo niryāyatī ya iya śikṣa guṇe ratānām
T03bsu028pu:81: rupe na prajña iti rupi na asti prajñā vijñāna saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca /
T03bsu028pu:82: na ca eti prajña iti teṣa na asti prajñā ākāśadhātusama tasya na cāsti bhedaḥ // Rgs_2.9 //
T03bsu028pu:83: ārambaṇāna prakṛtī sa a(na)ntapārā sattvāna yā ca prakṛtī sa anantapārā /
T03bsu028pu:84: ākāśadhātuprakṛtī sa anantapārā prajñā pi lokavidunāṃ sa anantapārā //
T03bsu028pu:85: saṃjñeti nāma parikīrtitu nāyakena saṃjñāṃ vibhāviya prahāṇa vrajanti pāram /
T03bsu028pu:86: ye atra saṃjñavigamaṃ anuprāpnuvanti te pāraprāpta sthita pāramite hu bhonti // Rgs_2.11 //
T03bsu028pu:87: saci gaṅgavālukasamāni sthihitva kalpāṃ sattveti śabda parikīrtayi nāyako 'yam /
T03bsu028pu:88: sattvasyupādu kutu bheṣyati ādiśuddho eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā //
T03bsu028pu:89: evaṃ jino bhaṇati apratikūlabhāṇī yadahaṃ imāya varapāramitāya āsī /
T03bsu028pu:90: tada vyākṛto 'hu parāpuruṣottamena buddho bhaviṣyasi anāgataadhvanasmin //
T03bsu028pu:92: ya imāṃ grahīṣyati paryāpuṇatī sa nityaṃ prajñāya pāramita yatra caranti nāthāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:93: viṣa vahni śastra udakaṃ na kramāti tasyo otāru māru na ca vindati mārapakṣo // Rgs_3.1 //
T03bsu028pu:94: parinirvṛtasya sugatasya kareyya stūpāṃ pūjeya saptaratanāmayu kaścideva /
T03bsu028pu:95: tehi prapūrṇa siya kṣetrasahasrakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikasamaiḥ sugatasya stūpaiḥ // Rgs_3.2
T03bsu028pu:96: yāvanta sattva puna tāntaka kṣetrakoṭyo te sarvi pūjana kareyuranantakalpān /
T03bsu028pu:99: yaśco imāṃ sugatamāta likhitva puste yata utpatī daśabalāna vināyakānām /
T03bsu028pu:100: dhāreyi satkarayi puṣpavilepanehi kala puṇya bhonti na sa stūpi karitva pūjām // Rgs_3.4 //
T03bsu028pu:101: mahavidya prajña ayu pāramitā janānāṃ dukhadharmaśokaśamanī pṛthusattvadhātoḥ /
T03bsu028pu:102: ye 'tīta ye 'pi ca daśaddiśa lokanāthā ima vidya śikṣita
T03bsu028pu:104: ye vā caranti cariyāṃ hitasānukampām iha vidyaśikṣita vidu spṛśiṣyanti bodhim /
T03bsu028pu:105: ye saukhya saṃskṛta asaṃskṛta ye ca saukhyā sarve ca saukhya prasutā itu veditavyāḥ // Rgs_3.6
T03bsu028pu:106: bījāḥ prakīrṇa pṛthivīsthita saṃbhavanti sāmagri labdhva viruhanti anekarupāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:107: yāvanti bodhiguṇa pāramitāśca pañca prajñāya pāramita te viruhanti sarve
T03bsu028pu:108: yenaiva rāja vrajate sa ha cakravartī tenaiva sapta ratanā balakāya sarve /
T03bsu028pu:109: yenaiva prajña iya pāramitā jinānāṃ tenaiva sarvaguṇadharma samāgamanti //
T03bsu028pu:111: śakro jinena paripṛcchitu praśnamāhu saci gaṅgavālikasamā siya buddhakṣetrāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:112: jinadhātu sarvi paripūrita cūḍibaddhā imameva prajñavarapāramitāhu gṛhṇe
T03bsu028pu:113: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na mi śarīri agauravatvaṃ api tū khu prajñaparibhāvita pūjayanti /
T03bsu028pu:114: yatha rājaniśrita naro labhi sarvi pūjāṃ tatha prajñapāramitaniśrita buddhadhātuḥ // Rgs_4.2
T03bsu028pu:115: maṇiratna sarvi guṇayukta anarghaprāpto yasmiṃ karaṇḍaki bhave sa namasyanīyaḥ /
T03bsu028pu:116: tasyāpi uddhṛta spṛhanti karaṇḍakasmiṃ tasyaiva te guṇa mahāratanasya bhonti // Rgs_4.3 //
T03bsu028pu:117: emeva prajñavarapāramitāguṇāni yannirvṛte 'pi jinadhātu labhanti pūjām /
T03bsu028pu:118: tasmā hu tān jinaguṇā(n) parighettukāmo so prajñapāramita gṛhṇatu eṣa mokṣo // Rgs_4.4
T03bsu028pu:119: pūrvaṃgamā bhavatu dānu dadantu prajñā śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya tathaiva dhyāne /
T03bsu028pu:120: parigrāhikā kuśaladharmaavipraṇāśe ekā ca sā api nidarśayi sarvadharmān //
T03bsu028pu:121: yatha jambudvīpi bahuvṛkṣasahasrakoṭī nānāprakāra vividhāśca anekarūpāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:122: na vi chāyanānatu bhaveta viśeṣatāpi anyatra chāyagatasaṃkhya prabhāṣamāṇā // Rgs_4.6 //
T03bsu028pu:123: emeva pañca imi pāramitā jinānāṃ prajñāya pāramita nāmatayā bhavanti /
T03bsu028pu:124: sarvajñatāya pariṇāmayamāṇa sarve ṣaḍapīha ekanayamarchati bodhināmā //
T03bsu028pu:126: saci rūpa saṃjña api vedana cetanāyāṃ cittaṃ anitya pariṇāmayi bodhisattvo
T03bsu028pu:127: pra(ti)varṇikāya carate aprajānamāno na hi dharma paṇḍita vināśa karoti jātu // Rgs_5.1
T03bsu028pu:128: yasmin na rūpa api vedana cāpi saṃjñā vijñāna naiva na pi cetanayopalabdhiḥ /
T03bsu028pu:129: anupādu śūnya na ya jānati sarvadharmān eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā
T03bsu028pu:130: yāvanti gaṅganadivālikatulyakṣetre tāvanti sattva arahanti vineya kaścit /
T03bsu028pu:131: yaścaiva prajña ima pāramitā likhitvā parasattvi pustaku dadeya viśiṣṭapuṇyaḥ // Rgs_5.3 //
T03bsu028pu:132: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ta iha śikṣita vādiśreṣṭhā gamayanti dharma nikhilāniha śūnyatāyām /
T03bsu028pu:133: yāṃ śrutva śrāvaka spṛśanti vimukti śīghraṃ pratyekabodhi spṛśayanti ca buddhabodhim // Rgs_5.4
T03bsu028pu:134: asato 'ṅkurasya drumasaṃbhavu nāsti loke kuta śākhapatraphalapuṣpaupādu tatra /
T03bsu028pu:135: vina bodhicitta jinasaṃbhavu nāsti loke kuta śakrabrahmaphala śrāvakaprādubhāvaḥ // Rgs_5.5
T03bsu028pu:136: ādityamaṇḍalu yadā prabhajāla muñcī karmakriyāsu tada sattva parākramanti /
T03bsu028pu:137: tatha bodhicitta sada lokavidusya jñāto jñānena sarvaguṇadharma samāgamanti // Rgs_5.6 //
T03bsu028pu:138: yatha nopatapta asato bhujagādhipasya kuta nadyaprasravu bhavediha jambudvīpe /
T03bsu028pu:139: asatā nadīya phalapuṣpa na saṃbhaveyuḥ na ca sāgarāṇa ratanā bhavi naikarūpāḥ // Rgs_5.7 //
T03bsu028pu:140: tatha bodhicitta asatīha tathāgatasya kuta jñānaprasravu bhavediha sarvaloke /
T03bsu028pu:141: jñānasya co asati nāsti guṇāna vṛddhiḥ na ca bodhi sāgarasamā na ca buddhadharmāḥ // Rgs_5.8
T03bsu028pu:142: yāvanti loki kvaci jotikaprāṇabhūtā obhāsanārtha prabha osarayanti sarve /
T03bsu028pu:143: varasūryamaṇḍalaviniḥsṛta ekaraśmī na kalā pi jyotikagaṇe siya sarvaābhāḥ // Rgs_5.9 //
T03bsu028pu:145: yāvanti śrāvakagaṇāḥ prasavanti puṇyaṃ dānaṃ ca śīlamapi bhāvanasaṃprayuktam /
T03bsu028pu:146: sa hi bodhisattva anumodana ekacitte na ca sarvaśrāvakagaṇe siya puṇyaskandho // Rgs_6.1 //
T03bsu028pu:147: ye buddhakoṭiniyutā purimā vyatītā ye vā anantabahukṣetrasahasrakoṭayaḥ /
T03bsu028pu:148: tiṣṭhanti ye 'pi parinirvṛta lokanāthā deśanti dharmaratanaṃ dukhasaṃkṣayāya // Rgs_6.2 //
T03bsu028pu:149: prathamaṃ upādu varabodhayi cittupādo yāvat su dharmakṣayakālu vināyakānām /
T03bsu028pu:150: ekasmi tatra ciya teṣa jināna puṇyaṃ saha yukta pāramita ye 'pi ca buddhadharmāḥ // Rgs_6.3
T03bsu028pu:151: yaścaiva buddhatanayāna(ca) śrāvakāṇāṃ śaikṣa aśaikṣa kuśalāsrava nāsravāśca /
T03bsu028pu:152: paripiṇḍayitva anumodayi bodhisattvo sarvaṃ ca nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhi // Rgs_6.4 //
T03bsu028pu:153: pariṇāmayantu yadi vartati cittasaṃjñā tatha bodhisattvapariṇāmana sattvasaṃjñā /
T03bsu028pu:154: saṃjñāya dṛṣṭisthitu citta trisaṅgayukto pariṇāmitaṃ na bhavatī upalabhyamānam // Rgs_6.5
T03bsu028pu:155: saci eva jānati nirudhyati kṣīṇadharmā taccaita kṣīṇa pariṇāmayiṣyanti yatra /
T03bsu028pu:156: na ca dharma dharmi pariṇāmayate kadācit pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati eva prajānamāne // Rgs_6.6 //
T03bsu028pu:157: saci so nimitta kurute na ca mānayāti atha ānimitta pariṇāmita bhonti bodhau /
T03bsu028pu:158: viṣasṛṣṭa bhojanu yathaiva kriyāpraṇīto tatha śukladharmaupalambha jinena ukto // Rgs_6.7
T03bsu028pu:159: tasmā hu nāmapariṇāmana śikṣitavyā yatha te jinā kuśala eva prajānayanti /
T03bsu028pu:160: yajjātiyo 'yaṃ prabhavo yadalakṣaṇaṃ ca anumodamī tatha tathā pariṇāmayāmi
T03bsu028pu:161: evaṃ ca puṇya pariṇāmayamāna bodhau na ca so hi buddha kṣipate jina uktavādī /
T03bsu028pu:162: yāvanti loki upalambhikabodhisattvā abhibhonti sarvi pariṇāmayamāna śūro
T03bsu028pu:165: vina prajña pañca imi pāramitā acakṣuḥ avināyakā na prabhavanti spṛśetu bodhim // Rgs_7.1
T03bsu028pu:166: yatrāntarasmi bhavate pragṛhīta prajñā tatu labdhacakṣu bhavatī imu nāmadheyam /
T03bsu028pu:167: yatha citrakarmapariniṣṭhita cakṣuhīno na ca tāva puṇyu labhate akaritva cakṣuḥ // Rgs_7.2

T03bsu028pu:338: yo bodhisattva varaprajña vibhāvayanto tata utthito kathayi dharma nirupalepam /
T03bsu028pu:339: taṃ cāpi nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhau nāsti triloka śubha tena samaṃ bhaveyā // Rgs_18.5 //
T03bsu028pu:340: taṃ caiva puṇya puna khyāyati riktameva tatha śūnya tuccha vaśikaṃ ca asārakaṃ ca /
T03bsu028pu:341: evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñāṃ caramāṇu puṇyu parigṛhṇati aprameyam
T03bsu028pu:342: abhilāpamātra ima jānati sarvadharmāṃ buddhena deśita prayukta prakāśitāṃśca /
T03bsu028pu:343: kalpāna koṭinayutāṃ bahu bhāṣamāṇo na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati dharmadhātuḥ // Rgs_18.7
T03bsu028pu:344: ye cāpi pañca imi pāramitā jinānām ete 'pi dharma parikīrtita nāmamātrāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:345: pariṇāmayāti na ca manyati bodhisattvo na ca hīyate spṛśati uttamabuddhabodhim // Rgs_18.8
T03bsu028pu:347: tailasya varti jvalitā prathame nipāte na ca dagdha varti asatā na vinā ya dagdhā /
T03bsu028pu:348: na hi arci paścimanipāta sa varti dagdhā asatā pi paścima na dahyati dīpavarti // Rgs_19.1
T03bsu028pu:349: prathameva citta spṛśatī na ca agrabodhim asatā na tasya spṛśatā puna śakya bhonti /
T03bsu028pu:350: na ca citta paścima śivāmanuprāpuṇāti asatā na tasya puna prāpaṇanāya śakyam // Rgs_19.2 //
T03bsu028pu:351: bījātu stamba phala puṣpa samāgamanti so vāniruddha asato na hi tasya vṛkṣo /
T03bsu028pu:352: emeva citta prathamaṃ tu nidāna bodheḥ so vā niruddha asato na hi tasya bodhiḥ // Rgs_19.3
T03bsu028pu:353: bījaṃ pratītya ca bhavedyavaśālikādes tattatphalaṃ na ca tadasti na cāpi nāsti /
T03bsu028pu:354: utpattito bhavati bodhiriyaṃ jinānāṃ bhāvasvabhāvavigatā bhavatīha māyā //
T03bsu028pu:355: udakabindu kumbha paripūryati stokastokaṃ prathame nipāti anupūrva sa paścimena /
T03bsu028pu:356: emeva citta prathamaṃ varabodhihetur anupūrva śuklaguṇapūrṇa bhavanti buddhāḥ // Rgs_19.5
T03bsu028pu:357: śūnyānimittapraṇidhiṃ caramāṇu dharmā na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī /
T03bsu028pu:358: yatha nāviko kuśala gacchati ārapāram ubhayānti asthitu na tiṣṭhati arṇavesmin // Rgs_19.6
T03bsu028pu:359: evaṃ carantu na ca manyati bodhisattvo ahu vyākṛto daśabalehi spṛśeya bodhim /
T03bsu028pu:360: na ca trāsu bodhi bhavate na ihāsti kiṃcid evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñām // Rgs_19.7
T03bsu028pu:361: kāntāramārgi durabhikṣi savyādhi lokāṃ paśyitva nāsti bhaya uttari saṃnahante /
T03bsu028pu:362: aparāntakoṭi sada yukta prajānamāno aṇumātra kheda manaso na upādiyāti //
T03bsu028pu:364: puna bodhisattva caramāṇu jināna prajñāṃ anupāda skandha imi jānati ādiśūnyān /
T03bsu028pu:365: asamāhito karuṇa prekṣati sattvadhātum atrāntare na parihāyati buddhadharmān // Rgs_20.1 //
T03bsu028pu:366: puruṣo yathā kuśala sarvaguṇairupeto balavān dudharṣu kṛtayogya kalāvidhijño /
T03bsu028pu:368: mātā pitā ca parigṛhya saputradāraṃ kāntāramārgi pratipadya bahūamitro /
T03bsu028pu:369: so nirmiṇitva puruṣān bahu śūravīrān kṣemeṇa gatva puna gehamupāgameyyā //
T03bsu028pu:370: emeva yasmi samaye vidu bodhisattvo mahamaitri sarvi upabandhati sattvadhātau /
T03bsu028pu:371: caturo sa māra atikramya dvaye ca bhūmim asmin samādhi sthitu no ca spṛśāti bodhim // Rgs_20.4
T03bsu028pu:372: ākāśaniśrita samīraṇa āpaskandho ta hi niśritā iha mahāpṛthivī jagacca /
T03bsu028pu:373: sattvāna karmaupabhoganidānameva ākāśasthānu kutu cintayi etamartham //
T03bsu028pu:374: emeva śūnyatapratiṣṭhitu eṣa sattvo jagati kriyāṃ vividha darśayate vicitrām /
T03bsu028pu:375: sattvāna jñānapraṇidhānaadhiṣṭhānameva na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati śūnyata nāsti sthānam // Rgs_20.6
T03bsu028pu:376: yasmiṃśca kāli vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo caratī imāṃ pravara śūnya samādhi śāntām /
T03bsu028pu:377: atrāntare na ca nimitta prabhāvitavyo na ca ānimittasthitu śānta praśāntacārī // Rgs_20.7
T03bsu028pu:378: pakṣisya nāsti padu gacchata antarīkṣe no cāpi tatra sthitu no ca patāti bhūmau /
T03bsu028pu:379: tatha bodhisattva caramāṇu vimokṣadvāre na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī // Rgs_20.8
T03bsu028pu:380: iṣvastraśikṣita yathā puruṣodha kāṇḍaṃ kṣepitva anya puna kāṇḍa paraspareṇa /
T03bsu028pu:381: patanāya tasya purimasya na deya bhūmim ākāṅkṣamāṇa puruṣasya pateya kāṇḍam // Rgs_20.9 //
T03bsu028pu:382: emeva prajñavarapāramitāṃ caranto prajñā upāya bala ṛddhi vicāramāṇo /
T03bsu028pu:383: tāvanna tāṃ paramaśūnyata prāpuṇoti yāvanna te kuśalamūla bhavanti pūrṇāḥ
T03bsu028pu:384: bhikṣū yathā paramaṛddhibalenupeto gagane sthito yamaka kurvati prātihāryāṃ /
T03bsu028pu:385: gaticaṃkramaṃ śayaniṣadya nidarśayāti na nivartate na pi ca khidyati yāva tatra // Rgs_20.11
T03bsu028pu:386: emeva śūnyatasthito vidu bodhisattvo jñānarddhipāramigato aniketacārī /
T03bsu028pu:387: vividhāṃ kriyāṃ jagati darśayate anantāṃ na ca bhajyatī na pi ca khidyati kalpakoṭī // Rgs_20.12
T03bsu028pu:388: puruṣā yathā mahaprapāti sthihitva kecid ubhi pāṇi chatradvaya gṛhṇa upakṣayeyyā /
T03bsu028pu:389: ākāli vāyuravasṛjya mahāprapāte no ca prapāta patiyāti na yāva tatra //
T03bsu028pu:390: emeva sthitva karuṇāṃ vidu bodhisattvo prajñāupāyadvayachatraparigṛhīto /
T03bsu028pu:391: śūnyānimittapraṇidhiṃ vimṛṣāti dharmān na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati paśyati dharmacārī // Rgs_20.14
T03bsu028pu:392: ratanārthiko yatha vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ labdhvāna ratna puna gehamupāgameyyā /
T03bsu028pu:393: kiṃcāpi tatra sukha jīvati sārthavāho api duḥkhito manasi bhoti sa jātisaṃgho // Rgs_20.15
T03bsu028pu:394: emeva śūnyata vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ labdhvāna dhyāna bala indriya bodhisattvo /
T03bsu028pu:395: kiṃcāpi nirvṛti spṛśedabhinandamāno api sarvasattva dukhitā manasī bhavanti // Rgs_20.16 //
T03bsu028pu:396: abhyantare ya nagare nigame ca grāme kāmārtha vāṇiju yathā gami jānanāya /
T03bsu028pu:397: no cāpi tatra sthihatī na ca ratnadvīpe na ca geha mārgi kuśalo puna bhoti vijño // Rgs_20.17
T03bsu028pu:398: tatha jñāna śrāvakavimuktisapratyayānāṃ sarvatra bhoti kuśalo vidu bodhisattvo /
T03bsu028pu:399: no cāpi tatra sthihate na ca buddhajñāne na ca saṃskṛte bhavati mārgavidū vidhijño // Rgs_20.18
T03bsu028pu:400: yaṃ kāli maitri jagatī anubandhayitvā śūnyānimittapraṇidhī carate samādhim /
T03bsu028pu:401: asthānameva yadi nirvṛti prāpuṇeyā athavāpi saṃskṛta sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ // Rgs_20.19 //
T03bsu028pu:402: yatha nirmito puruṣa no va adṛśyakāyo nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ /
T03bsu028pu:403: tatha bodhisattva caramāṇu vimokṣadvāraṃ nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ // Rgs_20.20
T03bsu028pu:404: yadi pṛcchamāna cari indriya bodhisattvo gambhīradharmaparidīpana no karoti /
T03bsu028pu:405: śūnyānimitta avivartiyabodhidharmāṃ na ca śocatī na ca sa vyākṛtu veditavyo // Rgs_20.21 //
T03bsu028pu:406: arhantabhūmimapi pratyayabuddhabhūmau traidhātukaṃ na spṛśate supināntare
T03bsu028pu:408: buddhāṃśca paśyati katheti janasya dharmaṃ avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyo // Rgs_20.22
T03bsu028pu:409: triapāyaprāptu supinasmi viditva sattvān praṇidheti tatkṣaṇa apāya ucchoṣayeyam /
T03bsu028pu:410: satyādhiṣṭhāni praśameti sa cāgniskandham avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyo // Rgs_20.23
T03bsu028pu:411: bhūtagrahā vividha vyādhaya martyaloke satyādhiṣṭhāni praśameti hitānukampī /
T03bsu028pu:412: na ca tena manyanupapadyati nāpi mānam avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyaḥ
T03bsu028pu:414: athavāsya manyanupapadyati vyākṛto 'smi satyādhiṣṭhāna vividhāni samṛddhyayanti /
T03bsu028pu:415: yadi anya vyākṛtaku manyati bodhisattvo jñātavya manyanasthito ayu alpabuddhiḥ // Rgs_21.1
T03bsu028pu:416: nāmādhiṣṭhāna puna māra upāgamitvā evaṃ vadiṣyati idaṃ tava nāmadheyam /
T03bsu028pu:417: mātāpitāya anusaptamupaiti vaṃśo buddho yadā bhavi idaṃ tava nāmadheyam //
T03bsu028pu:418: dhutavṛtta yādṛśu sa bheṣyati yuktayogī pūrvaṃ pi tubhya imi āsi guṇovarūpā /
T03bsu028pu:419: yo eva śrutva abhimanyati bodhisattvo jñātavyu māru paryutthitu alpabuddhiḥ // Rgs_21.3 //
T03bsu028pu:420: pravivikta grāmanagare girikandarāṇi raṇyā vivikta vanaprastha niṣevamāṇo
T03bsu028pu:421: ātmānukarṣi para paṃsayi bodhisattvo jñātavyu māru paryutthitu alpabuddhiḥ // Rgs_21.4
T03bsu028pu:422: grāme ca rāṣṭri nigame viharanti nityaṃ rahapratyayāni spṛhatāṃ janayanti tatra /
T03bsu028pu:423: anyatra sattvaparipācanabodhiyuktā eṣo viveku kathito sugatātmajānām //
T03bsu028pu:425: no cā viveku imu jānati bodhisattvo saṃkīrṇa so viharate adhimānaprāptaḥ
T03bsu028pu:427: abhimanyate na imi raṇyavivekacārī na vivekagocaru ayaṃ hi jinena ukto //
T03bsu028pu:428: grāmānti yo viharate athavā araṇye dvayayānacittavigato niyato 'grabodhim
T03bsu028pu:429: eṣo viveku jagadarthabhiprasthitānāṃ ātmā kṣiṇoti tulayeya sa bodhisattvo // Rgs_21.8 //
T03bsu028pu:431: tasmā hu mānu nihanitvana paṇḍitena guruāśayena varabodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ /
T03bsu028pu:432: vaidyo va ātura svarogacikitsanārthaṃ kalyāṇamitra bhajitavya atandritena
T03bsu028pu:433: buddhā ya bodhivaraprasthita bodhisattvā kalyāṇamitra imi pāramitā nidiṣṭāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:434: te cānuśāsaka iyaṃ pratipattibhūmī duvi kāraṇena anubudhyati buddhabodhim // Rgs_22.2 //
T03bsu028pu:435: atikrāntanāgata jinā sthita ye diśāsu sarveṣu mārgu ayu pāramitā ananyo /
T03bsu028pu:436: obhāsa ulka varabodhayi prasthitānām āloka śāstri imi pāramitā pradiṣṭāḥ
T03bsu028pu:437: yatha prajñapāramita śūnyata lakṣaṇena tathalakṣaṇā ya imi jānati sarvadharmān /
T03bsu028pu:438: śūnyānalakṣaṇa prajānayamāna dharmān evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñām // Rgs_22.4 //
T03bsu028pu:439: āhārakāma parikalpayamāna sattvāḥ saṃsāri yuktamanasaḥ sada saṃsmaranti /
T03bsu028pu:440: ahu mahya dharma ubhi eti abhūta śūnyā ākāśagaṇṭhi ayu ātmana baddha bāle
T03bsu028pu:441: yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjñata abhyupaiti no cāsya koṣṭhagatu so viṣu pātyate ca /
T03bsu028pu:442: emeva bālupagato ahu mahya eṣo ahasaṃjñi jāyi mriyate ca sadā abhūto //
T03bsu028pu:443: yatha udgraho tatha prakāśitu saṃkileśo vyodāna ukta ahu mahya anopalabdhi
T03bsu028pu:444: na hi atra kaści yo kliśyati śudhyate vā prajñāya pāramita budhyati bodhisattve // Rgs_22.7
T03bsu028pu:445: yāvanta sattva nikhile iha jambudvipe te sarvi bodhivaracitta upādayitvā /
T03bsu028pu:446: dānaṃ daditva bahuvarṣasahasrakoṭīḥ sarvaṃ ca nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhau // Rgs_22.8
T03bsu028pu:447: yaścaiava prajñavarapāramitābhiyukto divasaṃ pi antamaśa ekanuvartayeyā /
T03bsu028pu:448: kalapuṇya so na bhavatī iha dānaskandho tadatandritena sada osaritavya prajñā // Rgs_22.9
T03bsu028pu:449: caramāṇu prajñavarapāramitāya yogī mahatīṃ janeti karuṇāṃ na ca sattvasaṃjñā /
T03bsu028pu:450: tada bhonti sarvajagatī vidu dakṣiṇīyā satataṃ amoghu paribhuñjati rāṣṭrapiṇḍam // Rgs_22.10
T03bsu028pu:451: cirabuddhadevamanujān triapāyi sattvān parimocituṃ ya iha icchati bodhisattvo /
T03bsu028pu:452: pṛthumārgu tīru upadarśayi sattvadhātau prajñāya pāramita yukta divā ca rātrau // Rgs_22.11
T03bsu028pu:453: puruṣo ya agru ratanasya alabdhapūrvo aparasmi kāli puna labdhva bhaveya tuṣṭo /
T03bsu028pu:454: sa ha labdhva nāśayi puno 'pi pramādabhūto nāśitva duḥkhi satataṃ ratanābhikāṅkṣī // Rgs_22.12
T03bsu028pu:455: emeva bodhivaraprasthita ratnatulyo prajñāya pāramita yogu na riñcitavyo /
T03bsu028pu:456: ratanaṃ va labdhva gṛhamāṇu abhinnasattvo anubuddhayati tvarito śivamabhyupaiti // Rgs_22.13
T03bsu028pu:458: udayāti sūryu vigatāśca marīcimālā vidhamitva sarva tamasākulamandhakāram
T03bsu028pu:459: avibhonti sarva krimijotikaprāṇabhūtāṃ sarvāṃśca tārakagaṇānapi candraābhām // Rgs_23.1 //
T03bsu028pu:460: emeva prajñavarapāramitāṃ caranto vidhamitva dṛṣṭigahanaṃ vidu bodhisattvo
T03bsu028pu:461: abhibhonti sarvajagatī rahapratyayāṃśca śūnyānimittacarito pṛthu bodhisattvo // Rgs_23.2 //
T03bsu028pu:462: yatha rājaputra dhanadāyaku arthakāmo sarveṣu śreṣṭha bhavate abhigāminīye /
T03bsu028pu:463: sa hyeṣa etarahi sattva pramocayāti prāgeva rājyasthitu bheṣyati paṭṭadhārī // Rgs_23.3 //
T03bsu028pu:464: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo amṛtasya dāyaku priyo marumānuṣāṇām /
T03bsu028pu:465: ayu eṣa eṣati hi sattvasukhābhiyukto prāgeva yāva sthitu bheṣyati dharmarājo // Rgs_23.4 //
T03bsu028pu:467: māro 'pi tasmi samaye bhavate saśalyo śokātu duḥkhitu anantamano
T03bsu028pu:469: diśadāha ulka kṣipate bhayadarśanārthaṃ kathameṣa dīnamanaso bhavi bodhisattvo // Rgs_24.1
T03bsu028pu:470: [yatha te bhavanti vidu āśayasaṃprayuktā divarātri prajñavarapāramitārthadarśī] /
T03bsu028pu:471: tada kāyacitta khagapakṣisatulyabhūtā avatāru so kutu labhiṣyati kṛṣṇabandhuḥ // Rgs_24.2
T03bsu028pu:472: kalahāvivādupagatā yada bodhisattvā bhonti parasparaviruddhaka ruṣṭacittāḥ
T03bsu028pu:473: tada māra tuṣṭu bhavatī paramaṃ udagro ubhi eti dūra bhaviṣyanti jināna jñāne // Rgs_24.3
T03bsu028pu:474: ubhi eti dūri bhaviṣyanti piśācatulyā ubhi eti ātma kariṣyanti pratijñahānim /
T03bsu028pu:475: duṣṭāna kṣāntivikalāna kuto 'sti bodhi tada māru tuṣṭu bhavatī namucīsapakṣo // Rgs_24.4
T03bsu028pu:476: yo bodhisattva ayu vyākṛtu vyākṛtasmiṃ cittaṃ pradūṣayi vivādu samārabheyyā /
T03bsu028pu:477: yāvanti cittakṣaṇikā khiladoṣayuktās tāvanta kalpa puna saṃnahitavya bhonti // Rgs_24.5 //
T03bsu028pu:478: atha tasyupadyati matīti aśobhanā ti kṣāntīya pāramita bodhi spṛśanti buddhāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:479: pratidarśayāti puna āyati saṃvarāṇi apayāti vā sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme
T03bsu028pu:481: yo śikṣamāṇu na upaiti kahiṃci śikṣāṃ na ca śikṣakaṃ labhati nāpi ca śikṣadharmān /
T03bsu028pu:482: śikṣā aśikṣa ubhayo avikalpamāno yo śikṣate sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme //
T03bsu028pu:483: yo bodhisattva imu jānati eva śikṣāṃ na sa jātu śikṣavikalo bhavate duśīlo
T03bsu028pu:484: ārādhiteṣu iha śikṣati buddhadharmaṃ śikṣātiśikṣakuśalo ti nirūpalambho //
T03bsu028pu:485: śikṣantu eva vidu prajña prabhaṃkarāṇāṃ notpadyate akuśalamapi ekacittam /
T03bsu028pu:486: sūrye yathā gagani gacchati antarīkṣe raśmīgate na sthihate purato
T03bsu028pu:488: prajñāya pāramita śikṣita saṃskṛtānāṃ sarveṣa pāramita bhontiha saṃgṛhītāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:489: satkāyadṛṣṭi yatha ṣaṣṭi duve ca dṛṣṭī antargatāstathami pāramitā bhavanti
T03bsu028pu:490: yatha jīvitendriya niruddhi ya kecidanye bhontī niruddha pṛthu indriya yāvadasti /
T03bsu028pu:491: emeva prajñacarite vidu uttamānāṃ sarveta pāramita ukta ya saṃgṛhītā //
T03bsu028pu:492: ye cāpi śrāvakaguṇā tatha pratyayānāṃ sarveṣu bhonti vidu śikṣitu bodhisattvā /
T03bsu028pu:493: no cāpi tatra sthihatāna spṛheti teṣām ayu śikṣitavyamati śikṣati etamartham // Rgs_25.6 //
T03bsu028pu:495: avivartiyasya varabodhayi prasthitasya yo cittupādu anumoditu āśayena /
T03bsu028pu:496: trisahasra meru tulayitva siyāpramāṇo na tveva tasya kuśalasyanumodanāye // Rgs_26.1 //
T03bsu028pu:497: yāvanta sattva kuśalārthika mokṣakāmā sarveṣa bhonti anumoditu puṇyarāśi /
T03bsu028pu:498: sattvarthi te jinaguṇa ananta prāpuṇitvā dāsyanti dharma jagatī dukhasaṃkṣayāye // Rgs_26.2
T03bsu028pu:499: yo bodhisattva avikalpaku sarvadharmān śūnyānimitta parijānati niṣprapañcān /
T03bsu028pu:500: na ca prajña bodhi parieṣati āśayena so yukta prajñavarapāramitāya yogī //
T03bsu028pu:501: ākāśadhātu gaganasya siyā virodho na hi tena tasya kutu kenacideṣa prāptā /
T03bsu028pu:502: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo abhyovakāśasadṛśo upaśāntacārī //
T03bsu028pu:503: yatha māyakārapuruṣasya na eva bhoti te śiṣya māṃ janata so ca karoti kāryam /
T03bsu028pu:504: paśyanti taṃ vividha kāryu nidarśayantaṃ na ca tasya kāyu na pi citta na nāmadheyam // Rgs_26.5
T03bsu028pu:505: emeva prajñacarite na kadāci bhoti buddhitva bodhi jagatī parimocayitvā /
T03bsu028pu:506: ātmopapatti vividhāṃ kriyasaṃprayogāṃ darśeti māyasadṛśo na vikalpacārī //
T03bsu028pu:507: yatha buddha nirmita karoti ca buddhakāryaṃ na ca tasyupadyati mado karamāṇu kiṃcit /
T03bsu028pu:508: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo darśeti sarva kriya nirmitamāyatulyam // Rgs_26.7 //
T03bsu028pu:509: palagaṇḍa dakṣa vidunā kṛtu dāruyantro puruṣe stritulya sa karoti ha sarvakāryam /
T03bsu028pu:510: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo jñānena sarva kriya kurvati nirvikalpo
T03bsu028pu:512: evaṃ carantu vidu nā pṛthudevasaṃghāḥ kṛtaañjalīpuṭa praṇamya namasyayanti /
T03bsu028pu:513: buddhā pi yāvata daśaddiśi lokadhātau guṇavarṇamālaparikīrtana kurvayanti
T03bsu028pu:514: yāvanti gaṅganadivālisame hi kṣetre sattvā ta sarvi parikalpa bhaveyu mārāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:515: ekaika roma puna tāntaka nirmiṇeyyā sarve na śakya karaṇe vidu antarāyam // Rgs_27.2 //
T03bsu028pu:516: catukāraṇehi balavāṃ vidu bodhisattvo bhavate dugharṣu catumāraasaṃprakampyo /
T03bsu028pu:517: śūnyāvihāri bhavate na ca sattvatyāgī yathavādi sattvakaruṇānugatāvasthānaḥ // Rgs_27.3 //
T03bsu028pu:518: yo bodhisattva adhimucyati bhāṣyamāṇām ima prajñapāramita māta tathāgatānām /
T03bsu028pu:519: pratipattiyā ca abhiyujyati āśayena sarvajñatāya abhiprasthitu veditavyo
T03bsu028pu:520: na ca dharmadhātutathatāya upaiti sthānaṃ bhavatī athānasthita so laghu antarīkṣe /
T03bsu028pu:521: vidyādharo va abhilambhu vanābhiprāyā khagu kālahīna druma mantrabalādhiṣṭhāno // Rgs_27.5
T03bsu028pu:522: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo na ca budhyakaṃ labhati nāpi ca buddhadharmān /
T03bsu028pu:523: na ca deśikaṃ na pi ca paśyaka dharmatāyāṃ śāntaiṣiṇāmayu vihāra guṇe ratānām // Rgs_27.6
T03bsu028pu:524: yāvanta śrāvakavihāra sapratyayānāṃ śāntā samādhipraśame sukhasaṃprayuktā
T03bsu028pu:525: arhanvimokṣa sthapayitva tathāgatānāṃ sarveṣu agra ayu vihāru niruttaraśca // Rgs_27.7
T03bsu028pu:526: ākāśi pakṣi viharāti na co patāti dakamadhyi matsya viharāti na co marāti
T03bsu028pu:527: emeva dhyānabalapāragu bodhisattvo śūnyāvihāri na ca nirvṛti prāpuṇāti //
T03bsu028pu:528: yo sarvasattvaguṇaagratu gantukāmo agraṃ spṛśeya paramādbhuta buddhajñānam
T03bsu028pu:529: agraṃ dadeya vara uttamadharmadānam imu agru sevatu vihāru hitaṃkarāṇām //
T03bsu028pu:531: yāvanti śikṣa paridīpita nāyakena sarveṣa śikṣa ayu agru niruttarā ca /
T03bsu028pu:532: yaḥ sarvaśikṣavidu icchati pāra gantum imu prajñapāramita śikṣati buddhaśikṣām // Rgs_28.1
T03bsu028pu:533: agraṃ nidhāna ayu uttamadharmakośa buddhāna gotrajananaṃ sukhasaukhyagañjo
T03bsu028pu:534: atikrāntanāgata daśaddiśi lokanāthā itu te prasūta na ca kṣīyati dharmadhātuḥ // Rgs_28.2
T03bsu028pu:535: yāvanti vṛkṣa phalapuṣpavanaspatī yā sarve ca medinisamudgata prādubhūtāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:536: na ca medinī kṣayamupaiti na cāpi vṛddhiṃ na ca khidyatī na parihāyati nirvikalpā // Rgs_28.3
T03bsu028pu:537: yāvanta buddhasama śrāvakapratyayāśca marutaśca sarvajagatī sukhasaukhyadharmāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:538: sarve ti prajñavarapāramitāprasūtā na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati jātu prajñā // Rgs_28.4
T03bsu028pu:539: yāvanta sattva mṛdumadhyamutkṛṣṭa loke sarve avidyaprabhavā sugatena uktāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:540: sāmagripratyayu pravartati duḥkhayantro na ca yantra kṣīyati avidya na cāpi vṛddhiḥ // Rgs_28.5
T03bsu028pu:541: yāvanti jñāna nayadvāra uyāyamūlāḥ sarve ti prajñavarapāramitāprasūtāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:542: sāmagripratyaya pravartati jñānayantro na ca prajñapāramita vardhati hīyate vā // Rgs_28.6
T03bsu028pu:543: yo tu pratītyasamutpādu anudbhavāye imu prajña akṣayata budhyati bodhisattvo /
T03bsu028pu:544: so sūrya abhrapaṭale yatha muktaraśmī vidhamitvavidyapaṭalaṃ bhavate svayaṃbhūḥ // Rgs_28.7
T03bsu028pu:546: caturbhī ca dhyāna viharanti mahānubhāvā na ca ālayo na pi ca niśrayu kurvayāti /
T03bsu028pu:547: api kho punāśrayu ime catudhyāna sāṅgā bheṣyanti bodhivarauttamaprāpaṇāya // Rgs_29.1 //
T03bsu028pu:548: dhyāne sthito 'tra bhavatī varaprajñalābhī ārūpyarūpi ca samādhi catasra
T03bsu028pu:550: upakāribhūta imi dhyāna varāgrabodhau na punāsravakṣati sa śikṣati bodhisattvo // Rgs_29.2
T03bsu028pu:551: āścaryamadbhutamidaṃ guṇasaṃcayānāṃ dhyāne samādhi viharanti nimitta nāsti
T03bsu028pu:552: tatra sthitāna yadi bhajyati ātmabhāvo puna kāmadhātu upapadyati yathābhiprāyā // Rgs_29.3
T03bsu028pu:553: yatha jambudvīpaka manuṣya alabdhapūrvā divi devauttamapurā anuprāpuṇeyā /
T03bsu028pu:554: paśyitva te viṣaya tatra parigṛhītā punarāgameya na ca niśrayu tatra kuryāt // Rgs_29.4 //
T03bsu028pu:555: emeva te guṇadharā varabodhisattvā dhyāne samādhi viharitva prayuktayogī /
T03bsu028pu:556: puna kāmadhātusthita bhonti anopaliptā padmeva vāriṇi aniśrita bāladharme // Rgs_29.5 //
T03bsu028pu:557: anyatra sattvaparipācana kṣetraśodhī paripūraṇārtha imi pāramitā mahātmā /
T03bsu028pu:558: ārūpyadhātuupapatti na prārthayantī yatreha bodhiguṇapāramitāna hāni //
T03bsu028pu:559: yatha kaścideva puruṣo ratanaṃ nidhānaṃ labdhvā tu tatra spṛhabuddhi na saṃjaneyyā /
T03bsu028pu:560: ekāki so puna gṛhītva parasmi kāle gṛhṇitva geha praviśitva na bhoti lubdho // Rgs_29.7 //
T03bsu028pu:561: emeva dhyāna catureva samādhi śāntāṃ labdhvāna prīti sukhadāṃ vidu bodhisattvāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:562: avasṛjya dhyānasukhaprītisamādhilābhaṃ puna kāmadhātu praviśanti jagānukampī // Rgs_29.8 //
T03bsu028pu:563: yadi bodhisattva viharāti samādhidhyāne rahapratyayāni spṛhabuddhi na saṃjaneyyā /
T03bsu028pu:564: asamāhito bhavati uddhatakṣiptacitto parihīnabuddhiguṇa nāvika bhinnanāvo
T03bsu028pu:565: kiṃcāpi rūpamapi śabda tathaiva gandho rasa sparśa kāmaguṇa pañcabhi yukta bhogī /
T03bsu028pu:569: yatha kumbhadāsi avaśāvaśa bhartikasya tatha sarvasattvavaśatāmupayānti dhīrāḥ // Rgs_29.11
T03bsu028pu:570: na ca svāmikasya prativākyu dadāti dāsī ākruṣṭa cāpi athavā sada tāḍitā vā
T03bsu028pu:571: ekāntatrastamanasā sa bhayābhibhūtā māmeva so anu vadhiṣyati kāraṇena //
T03bsu028pu:572: emeva bodhivaraprasthitu bodhisattvo tiṣṭheya sarvajagatī yatha preṣyabhūto /
T03bsu028pu:573: anu bodhiāgamu guṇāna ca pāripūrī tṛṇa agni kāṣṭhaprabhavo dahate tameva
T03bsu028pu:574: avasṛjya ātma sugatāṃ parasattvakārye abhiyukta rātridiva niṣpratikāṅkṣacitto /
T03bsu028pu:575: māteva ekasutake paricāryamāṇo adhyāśaye na parikhinna upasthiheti //
T03bsu028pu:578: na ca khedabuddhi aṇumātra upādiyāti so vīryapāramitayukta atandritaśca //
T03bsu028pu:579: saci kalpakoṭi gaṇaye vidu bodhisattvo cirasaṃjña bodhi samudāniya tena duḥkhe /
T03bsu028pu:580: ciraduḥkha bheṣyati samācaramāṇu dharmaṃ tatu vīryapāramitahīna kusīdarūpo
T03bsu028pu:581: prathamaṃ upādu varabodhayi cittupādo so vā anuttaraśivāmanuprāpuṇeyā /
T03bsu028pu:582: rātriṃdivaikamanasā tamadhiṣṭhiheyā ārambhavīrya vidu paṇḍitu veditavyo //
T03bsu028pu:583: saci kaścideva vadayeya sumeruśailaṃ bhinditva paśca adhigamyasi agrabodhim /
T03bsu028pu:584: saci khedabuddhi kurute ca pramāṇabuddhiṃ kausīdyaprāpta bhavate tada bodhisattvo // Rgs_30.4
T03bsu028pu:585: atha tasyupadyati matī kimutālpamātraṃ kṣaṇamātra bhasma nayatī vilayaṃ sumerum /
T03bsu028pu:586: ārambhavīrya bhavate vidu bodhisattvo nacireṇa bodhivara lapsyati nāyakānām // Rgs_30.5 //
T03bsu028pu:587: saci kāyacittavacasā ca parākrameyyā paripācayitva jagatī kariṣyāmi artham /
T03bsu028pu:588: kausīdyaprāpta bhavatī sthitu ātmasaṃjñaiḥ nairātmabhāvanavidūri nabhaṃ va bhūmeḥ // Rgs_30.6
T03bsu028pu:589: yasminna kāyu na pi citta na sattvasaṃjñā saṃjñāvivarti sthitu advayadharmacārī /
T03bsu028pu:590: ayu vīryapāramita ukta hitaṃkareṇa ākāṅkṣamāṇu śivamacyutamagrabodhim //
T03bsu028pu:591: paruṣaṃ śruṇitva vacanaṃ parato duruktaṃ paritoṣayāti susukhaṃ vidu bodhisattvo /
T03bsu028pu:592: ko bhāṣate ka śṛṇute kutu kasya kena so yukta kṣāntivarapāramitāya vijño // Rgs_30.8 //
T03bsu028pu:593: so bodhisattva kṣamate guṇadharmayukto yaścaiva ratnabharitaṃ trisahasra dadyāt /
T03bsu028pu:594: buddhāna lokavidunārhatapratyayānāṃ kalapuṇya so na bhavate iha dānaskandhe // Rgs_30.9 //
T03bsu028pu:596: [sattvāna śūnyavaradharma niśāmayātī priyu bhoti sarvajagatī kṣamamāṇu
T03bsu028pu:598: saci kaści candanapuṭaṃ grahiyāna sattvo abhyokireya gurupremata bodhisattvam /
T03bsu028pu:599: dvitīyo 'pi] agni sakale śirasi kṣipeyā ubhayatra tulyu manu tena upāditavyo // Rgs_30.11
T03bsu028pu:600: evaṃ kṣamitva vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo taṃ cittupādu pariṇāmayi agrabodhau
T03bsu028pu:601: yāvanti kṣānti rahapratyayasattvadhātoḥ abhibhoti sarvajagatī kṣamamāṇu śūraḥ // Rgs_30.12
T03bsu028pu:602: kṣamamāṇu eva puna citta upāditavyo narakeṣu tiryayamaloki aneka duḥkhā /
T03bsu028pu:603: anubhūya kāmaguṇahetu akāmakārā kasmā hu adya na kṣameya nidāna bodhau //
T03bsu028pu:605: yāvanti duḥkha jagatī ahu tatsahāmi kṣāntīya pāramita tiṣṭhati bodhisattvo
T03bsu028pu:607: śīlena udgata bhavanti samādhikāṅkṣī sthita gocare daśabalāna akhaṇḍaśīlāḥ /
T03bsu028pu:608: yāvanti saṃvarakriya anuvartayanti tāṃ sarvasattvahita bodhayi nāmayanti
T03bsu028pu:609: saci pratyayānarahabodhi spṛhāṃ janeti [duḥśīla bhoti]viduṣāṃ tatha chidracārī /
T03bsu028pu:610: atha bodhi uttamaśivāṃ pariṇāmayanti sthitu śīlapāramita kāmaguṇebhi yukto // Rgs_31.2
T03bsu028pu:611: yo dharma bodhiguṇaāgamu sūratānāṃ so śīlaarthu guṇadharmasamanvitānām /
T03bsu028pu:612: yo dharma bodhiguṇahāni hitaṃkarāṇāṃ duḥśīlatā ayu prakāśitu nāyakena //
T03bsu028pu:613: yadi pañca kāmaguṇa bhuñjati bodhisattvo buddhaṃ ca dharma śaraṇāgatu āryasaṃgham /
T03bsu028pu:614: sarvajñatā ca manasī bhaviṣyāmi buddho sthitu śīlapāramita vedayitavya vijño // Rgs_31.4 //
T03bsu028pu:615: yadi kalpakoṭi daśabhī kuśalaiḥ pathebhiś caramāṇu pratyayarahatvaspṛhāṃ janeti /
T03bsu028pu:616: tada khaṇḍaśīlu bhavate api chidraśīlo pārājiko gurutaro ayu cittupādo //
T03bsu028pu:617: rakṣantu śīla pariṇāmayi agrabodhiṃ na ca tena manyati na ātmana karṣayethā /
T03bsu028pu:618: ahusaṃjñatā ca parivarjita sattvasaṃjñā sthitu śīlapāramiti vucyati bodhisattvo // Rgs_31.6
T03bsu028pu:619: yadi bodhisattva caramāṇu jināna mārge imi śīlavānimi duśīla karoti sattvān /
T03bsu028pu:620: nānātvasaṃjñaprasṛto paramaṃ duśīlo api chidraśīlu na tu so pariśuddhaśīlo
T03bsu028pu:621: yasyo na asti ahasaṃjña na sattvasaṃjñā saṃjñāvirāgu kutu tasya asaṃvaro
T03bsu028pu:623: yasyo na saṃvari asaṃvari manyanāsti ayu śīlasaṃvaru prakāśitu nāyakena //
T03bsu028pu:624: yo evaśīlasamanvāgatu niṣprapañco anapekṣako bhavati sarvapriyāpriyeṣu /
T03bsu028pu:625: śirahastapāda tyajamāna adīnacitto sarvāstityāgi bhavate satataṃ alīno //
T03bsu028pu:626: jñātvā ca dharmaprakṛtīṃ vaśikā nirātmyaṃ ātmāna māṃsa tyajamānu adīnacitto /
T03bsu028pu:627: prāgeva vastu tada bāhira nātyajeyā asthānameta yadi matsari so kareyā //
T03bsu028pu:628: ahasaṃjñatastu mamatā bhavate ca rāgo kutu tyāgabuddhi bhaviṣyati sā muhānām /
T03bsu028pu:629: mātsarya preta bhavate upapadyayātī athavā manuṣya tada bhoti daridrarūpo
T03bsu028pu:630: tada bodhisattva imi jñātva daridrasattvān dānādhimukta bhavatī sada muktatyāgī /
T03bsu028pu:631: catvāri dvīpi samalaṃkṛtu kheṭatulyaṃ dattvā udagra bhavate na hi dvīpalabdho // Rgs_31.12
T03bsu028pu:632: dānaṃ daditva vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo yāvanti sattva tribhave samanvāharitvā /
T03bsu028pu:633: sarveṣu teṣu bhavate ayu dattadānaṃ taṃ cāgrabodhi pariṇāmayate jagārtham
T03bsu028pu:634: na ca vastuniśrayu karoti daditva dānaṃ vidu pāku naiva pratikāṅkṣati so kadācit /
T03bsu028pu:635: evaṃ tyajitva bhavate vidu sarvatyāgī alpaṃ tyajitva labhate bahu aprameyam // Rgs_31.14 //
T03bsu028pu:636: yāvanta sattva tribhave nikhilena asti te sarvi dāna dadayanti anantakalpān /
T03bsu028pu:637: buddhānuloki vidu nārhatipratyayānāṃ yāvanti śrāvakaguṇān parikalpa sthāne
T03bsu028pu:638: yaśco upāyakuśalo vidu bodhisattvo teṣāṃ sa puṇyakriyavastvanumodayitvā /
T03bsu028pu:639: sattvārtha agravarabodhayi nāmayeyā abhibhoti sarvajagatī pariṇāmayukto //
T03bsu028pu:640: kācasya vā maṇina rāśi siyā mahanto vaiḍūryaratna abhibhoti sa sarva eko /
T03bsu028pu:641: emeva sarvajagatī pṛthu dānaskandho abhibhoti sarvapariṇāmaku bodhisattvo
T03bsu028pu:642: yadi bodhisattva dadamāna jagasya dānaṃ mamatāṃ na tatra karayenna ca vastuprema /
T03bsu028pu:643: tatu vardhate kuśalamūla mahānubhāvo candro va tatra prabhamaṇḍalu śuklapakṣe // Rgs_31.18
T03bsu028pu:645: dānena pretagati chindati bodhisattvo dāridrakaṃ ca chinatī tatha sarvakleśān /
T03bsu028pu:646: bhogāṃścanantavipulāṃ labhate caranto dānena sattva paripācayi kṛcchraprāptān // Rgs_32.1
T03bsu028pu:647: śīlena tīryagati varjayi nekarupām aṣṭau ca akṣaṇa kṣaṇāṃ labhate sa nityam /
T03bsu028pu:648: kṣāntīya rupa labhate paramaṃ udāraṃ suvarṇacchavi priyu jagasya udīkṣaṇīyo // Rgs_32.2 //
T03bsu028pu:649: vīryeṇa śuklaguṇa hāni na abhyupaiti jñānaṃ ananta labhate jinakośagañjam
T03bsu028pu:650: dhyānena kāmaguṇa utsṛjate jugupsyān vidyā abhijña abhinirharate samādhim // Rgs_32.3 //
T03bsu028pu:651: prajñāya dharmaprakṛtī parijānayitvā traidhātukānta samatikramate apāyān /
T03bsu028pu:652: vartitva cakraratanaṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ deśeti dharma jagatī dukhasaṃkṣayāye
T03bsu028pu:653: paripūrayitva imi dharma sa bodhisattvo api kṣetraśuddhi parigṛhṇati sattvaśuddhim /
T03bsu028pu:654: api buddhavaṃśa parigṛhṇati dharmavaṃśaṃ tatha saṃghavaṃśa parigṛhṇati sarvadharmān // Rgs_32.5
T03bsu028pu:655: vaidyottamo jagati rogacikitsakārī prajñopadeśa kathito ayu bodhimārgo /
T03bsu028pu:656: nāmena ratnaguṇasaṃcaya bodhimārgaḥ taṃ sarvasattva itu mārgatu prāpnuvanti // Rgs_32.6 //
T03bsu028pu:659: lokaṃ prāpayituṃ sukhena padavīṃ saṃpaddūyāvāhinīṃ kāruṇyāhitacetasā bhagavatā buddhena saṃdīpitam
T03bsu028pu:662: kāle 'smin bahudṛṣṭisaṃkulakalau pāṭhe 'pi dūraṃ gate gāthābhedamanekapustakagataṃ dṛṣṭvādhunā nyāyataḥ /
T03bsu028pu:663: kūpaṃ vādigajendrakumbhadaraṇe bhadreṇa yā śodhitā lokārthaṃ hariṇā mayā suvihitā seyaṃ budhairgṛhyatām āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyā bhagavatyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parivartānusāreṇa bhagavatī ratnaguṇasaṃcayagāthā samāptā //
T03bsu028pu:664: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
T03bsu028pu:665: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
T03bsu028pu:667: yo 'sau dharmaṃ sugatagaditaṃ paṭhate bhaktibhāvān mātrāhīnaṃ kathamapi
T03bsu028pu:669: jihvādoṣaiḥ pavanacaritaiḥ śleṣmadoṣapracārair yūyaṃ buddhāḥ subhavanagatā bodhisattvāḥ kṣamadhvam samāptam /
